text: Phalata ami te'omra ahbanata samharai dichilo arau te'omka dana karaichilo iyaha'iya, arau te'omra babe te'omra straika (garbhadharanara) yogya karaichilo. Te'omloke satkarmata pratiyogita karaichila, lagate te'omloke amaka agraha arau bhitira saite ahbana karaichila arau te'omloka amara prati binita achila
